text: Michelle Christine Trachtenberg (October 11, 1985 - February 26, 2025) was an American television and movie actress. She was best known for her role as Dawn Summers from the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and as Georgina Sparks on the CW television show Gossip Girl. ==Early life== Trachtenberg was born in New York City, New York. She was of Russian Jewish descent on her mother's side of the family. Trachtenberg began acting in 1988 at the age of three. ==Death== Trachtenberg was found dead in her New York City apartment on February 26, 2025. Before her death, she had a liver transplant. Her cause of death was problems caused by diabetes. ==Works== === Movies === Year Title Role Notes 2006 Black Christmas Melissa Kitt Kicking It Old Skool Kim Beautiful Ohio Sandra 2005 Mysterious Skin Wendy limited release Ice Princess Casey Carlyle 2004 EuroTrip Jenny 1999 Inspector Gadget Penny 1998 Richie Rich's Christmas Wish Gloria direct-to-video 1996 Harriet the Spy Harriet M.
